TrainableDef.label: controlled blinking
TrainableDef.description: Override the creature's usual erratic blinking, allowing a directed way to blink to a chosen location within range.

TrainableDef.label: cycle severance
TrainableDef.description: Suppress the natural reproduction cycle, preventing the release of offspring and completely negating the creature’s asexual reproduction.

TrainableDef.label: controlled detonation
TrainableDef.description: The animal can willingly trigger a powerful self-destructive explosion, sacrificing itself in a final act that unleashes all stored volatile compounds in a devastating blast.

TrainableDef.label: controlled invisibility
TrainableDef.description: The animal can willingly shroud itself in a veil of controlled invisibility, vanishing from sight while retaining full awareness and precision.

TrainableDef.label: beastmastery
TrainableDef.description: Train and attune this animal to your will, granting direct control over their movements and actions through a powerful bond of dominance and trust.

TrainableDef.label: controlled corpse decay
TrainableDef.description: Teach the animal to control its corpse decaying abilities.

TrainableDef.label: digging discipline
TrainableDef.description: Teach the animal to control its terrain digging abilities.

TrainableDef.label: fume regulation
TrainableDef.description: Teach the animal to control its gas production abilities.
